short_summary: EH713-235473 Espace et installations de conférence. JPICC 2023 will be co-hosted from Vancouver or Victoria
description: The Government of Canada and the U.S. Indo-Pacific Command Directorate for Intelligence will be co-hosting JPICC 2023 in either Victoria or Vancouver and is in need of conference, meeting space, and catering services
full_summary:
# Request for Proposal: EH713-235473 Conference Space and Facilities #

## Notice Information

* **Reference Number:** WS3750128698-Doc3832115912
* **Solicitation Number:** WS3750128698
* **Publication Date:** January 18, 2023
* **Tender Closing Date:** February 14, 2023 at 14:00:00

## Amendment Information

* **Amendment Number**: 4
* **Amendment Date:** February 9, 2023

## Notice Details

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) [Ministère des Travaux publics et des Services gouvernementaux (SPAC)] is seeking proposals for conference space and facilities for the International Pacific Islands Conference and Coordination (IPICC) 2023.

The IPICC 2023 will be co-hosted by the Government of Canada and the U.S. Indo-Pacific Command Directorate for Intelligence (J2) in either Victoria or Vancouver, British Columbia. Catering services are also required.

## Selection Criteria

* **Procurement Method**: Competitive - Open Bidding
* **Trade Agreements**: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* **Regions of Opportunity**: British Columbia

## Location and Contact Information

* **Regions of Delivery**: British Columbia
* **Contracting Entity**: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) [Ministère des Travaux publics et des Services gouvernementaux (SPAC)]
* **Contact Person**: Clara Dumay, ( clara.dumay@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca )

Please note that the tender has already expired. If you wish to review the full notice, it can be found on the Discovery eSourcing platform at the following URL: [http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/15157388?extsite=MTUxNTczODhfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/15157388?extsite=MTUxNTczODhfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==) .  # Notice  Dismissed #
